name: Shape Witch (rough demo)
description:
I forgot to mention in the instructions that you can't use the numpad numbers, my bad. Hit the numbers on the top part of your keyboard.

MUSIC:

deep space prod by Riddiman https://www.beatstars.com/beat/deep-space-6655483

SFX: 

  • https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-spellselection-effect 
  • https://opengameart.org/content/magic-sfx-sample created by ViRiX Dreamcore (David Mckee) www.soundcloud.com/virix

Spent so much time on the art, ended up leaving this for a long time, maybe about 1-2 weeks work total?

I'd love to add more ~juice~ to the game, settings to change difficulty, just, a lot of adjustments which will take time. But for now, here's the jist of it
